storyInfo: With the help of the 'Trilby Asher,' Siege returns to the boxing gym in the lockdown zone with Rhodes Island's people in tow, and is met with Glasgow members old and new. Meanwhile, Manfred makes a test of teaching Paprika that only hate can unite the Sarkaz.

attributes.content: It's really changed around here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Ruins, corpses, and Originium dust floating from the dead.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I imagine you Rhodes Islanders don't need me worrying about your protection, being Oripathy specialists and all.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This war has been creating new Infected without end... and life under these circumstances can only make it harder.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They've been thrown into this chaos without warning, and they may not realize how cruel a fall it is yet. That goes for the pain of their illness, and the scars of war...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: But they'll know soon enough, and twice over.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We all have a clear picture of how it infects and festers, how the people die in their confusion, or amass in their hatred.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And you've seen where that hatred leads, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: War's given people a great excuse. Without the veil of daily life, things could get even worse.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Whatever reason it is, we need to stop Theresis.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...And Theresa.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Roger.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: It looks like we'll have to part ways for the moment. So goes our line of work—always piles of things nagging at you to deal with them.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Right. I think I'll be seeing you in a bit.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Stay productive, now.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Bleeding hell, he... he makes my hairs stand on end.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Not even old PC Whitman ever made me feel so sick.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Alright, everyone, chin up. Welcome to the HQ of we merry Glasgow Gangers. I mean, I can guarantee it WAS at least.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't know how Baird's been running the gym since we left...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Siege, Morgan, you not got anything to say?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Indra, love... I think I stepped on something...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Eh? Probably just someone's pet scarpering for the street aga...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The hell is... is that a...?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I've seen already, Doctor. In those illusions from the past, I've seen sights still more tragic than the ones here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're here precisely to ensure the situation doesn't unfold that far.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The hatted man led us here, then permitted us to act freely on our own wishes outside of the deal we made. His goal is clear to us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He knows we won't be content with letting all this be, and he hopes the people here will credit the Duke he serves with our actions.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I don't care.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't care how the Duke wants to use us. I don't care what kind of prestige she's hoping to rake in.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't care if this will impact some other duke's fight for their people's affections, or compel them to act in whatever way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All that matters is I cannot let this be.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This isn't some disaster taking place in a country, in a city, in a neighborhood unrelated to us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is happening to each and every living person.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Trust has always been a fragile thing, collapsed in a moment, ever harder to rebuild.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Quickly, Doctor. We might not have that many pharmaceuticals on us, but we have to make all the use of them that we can.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There, that should be okay now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm not a professional doctor. This is just some basic first-aid.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've stabilized your Oripathy symptoms, and stopped your wounds worsening. That's all we can do for now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You need rest, and supplements. After that, it's down to luck.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you need us to bring you home?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, no, no need!
attributes.name: Maimed Citizen

attributes.content: Hunger knocked me out, that's all. Just, was sleeping for a bit on the pavement.
attributes.name: Maimed Citizen

attributes.content: What... What'll you be wanting? I've got nothing to my name.
attributes.name: Maimed Citizen

attributes.content: We don't want anything.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: N... Nothing?
attributes.name: Maimed Citizen

attributes.content: Go back home, sir.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Here's some food. Keep it hidden. Don't let anyone else find out.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wh—Who the...?
attributes.name: Maimed Citizen

attributes.content: Alright, alright. I'll be out of here, then...
attributes.name: Maimed Citizen

attributes.content: (You've gone too long without food. Don't eat too quickly. You need to let your bodily functions recover bit by bit first.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right, got it...
attributes.name: Maimed Citizen

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Maimed Citizen

attributes.content: Amiya, we have a lot of people staring at us.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Most of them with ill will.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Two groups are planning their moves and readying Molotovs.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But at the same time, the desperate have seen us too. And the ones hiding themselves in the dark, deathly ill, so have they.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Just the fact we're here might have been enough to relight a spark of hope in them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: After a violent collapse, any rebuild demands great care.

attributes.content: That's right, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We don't need for the people to trust us, we need them to... reestablish their trust in each other.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's what underlies a society coming back to life.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Someone's coming.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. I'm stood right here. I'll stand in front of you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This is our street, and we're pulling her back out of this chaos and anger.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Doesn't matter who it is. Bring it on.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Mind yourselves. Here they come.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Is that—
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: (Oi, watch you don't fuss about nothing, Hannah. Nearly socked you straight in the gob.)
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: (You lot show off like a circus. You want everyone here targeting you?)
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: (Come on. With me.)
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: They're gonna run!
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: Shit! The Glasgows got in first!
attributes.name: Angry Thug

attributes.content: Surround 'em!
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: Out of the way.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Ms. Ines, don't take them on. Not for now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I... recognize a few of their lot. It's just the fear and torture's driving them mad.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Nothing they need to pay for with their lives.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: (Head to the alley we used to bunk off at for snooker. Same door as ever.)
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: (Got it.)
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: (Baird, we'll... see you at home.)
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Come with me!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Quick! Get a move on, don't lose 'em!
attributes.name: Angry Thug

attributes.content: I... I haven't eaten for days, I can't run...
attributes.name: Starving Thug

attributes.content: On your bike and get out of here, then! You'd eat dead people if you had any spine! I'm not your nanny!
attributes.name: Angry Thug

attributes.content: You wanna go?
attributes.name: Angry Thug

attributes.content: Who are those people?
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Eh? Who else are they gonna be? It's the Glasgow bastards!
attributes.name: Angry Thug

attributes.content: The Glasgow Gang, are they.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Are we getting them together, or am I getting you?
attributes.name: Angry Thug

attributes.content: No, I reckon I've seen them before. And that one in the uniform...
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Things here got more complex than I was predicting.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: I need to move fast.
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Is there a bigger ruckus in there today or something? Did a fire start again?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Should I go take a look, sir?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: If a fire spreads...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Then it's no skin off your nose, little girl.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Do your own job. Don't let me see anything funny.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: No one's going to look out for you here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: A... Aye-aye, sir!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Sir! What brings you here in person?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: There's nothing you need to worry about here, it's all under control!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Paying no heed to the Sarkaz soldier's report, Manfred walks over to the foot of the blockade zone's wall, gazing far off at the buildings within.
Is... Is something off, sir?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: The war continues to proceed smoothly.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Paprika, what have you witnessed in these past days?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: They've just been—slaughtering each other.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: No, it's not even that, really... they've just been... so scared.
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Fear and mistrust divide a people. Pacts, customs and morals all collapse forthwith under extreme conditions.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The Kazdel of old attested to that.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Kazdel...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hence do our two leaders take a stand.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You mean...?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: What if I were to ask you—what can bind a people?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Maybe... patience? We can try and win people over, or use our own kindness to move others...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: I think, as long as you have enough time...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: She failed.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Any ties that such things build are too frail.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But he told me. The most efficient thing... is hate.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Manfred throws an indifferent glance at the young mercenary girl, her breaths bound tight by nerves, daring only to stare at the tips of her own shoes.
You have persistently been sharing your own supplies with those behind the blockade.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: N—No! That was a Sarkaz! I thought...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: What?! How could you—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Sarkaz who serve Victoria should make you even more sick!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Sir, I assure you, I will immediately...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Continue.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ...Sir?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: We cannot have everyone inside dying of starvation yet.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: In time... they will be of great use to the Military Commission.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Not much has changed around here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Morgan, all your graffiti's still up.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm looking now. My standards must have been terrible back then.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You haven't got much better, though?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Oh, you wanna go, Hannah?!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: As the two argue, Siege and Baird look on, then make brief eye contact, and break into laughter, shaking their heads.
If you overlook the sealed-up entrance, the boarded-up windows and the weariness in their expressions, it might all seem like nothing's changed.
But everyone knows deep inside. 'We haven't changed' is self-consolation at most, a kind of illusion.
Every minute and second that's ever passed has left an unquestionable mark on them.
Long time no see, Baird.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: True that, Vina. Long time no see.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: The fact you're still around and kicking is probably the best news I've had in a long while.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I've never said die, you know that.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: That I do.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina, I'm... just as happy to see you back here. Happier than you could imagine.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I always believed you'd come back. We put up the sign for the Slobberknocker together and all, back in the early days.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Just, it's been hard for me to grin and bear it. In these times.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And I know you didn't come back just for my sakes.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Five whole years ago you scrambled out of here... I remember Norport was practically open season already, all those bastards after your neck.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: I... wasn't ready then.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I didn't want to tow anyone else into my business. It was leave or nothing.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: So? You're back here now, back on our street. Now you're ready.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: ...I hope I am.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Rhodes Islanders want to look for that Sarkaz airship here. I'll be assisting them as a Rhodes operator and all.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But I've never stopped being a member of the Glasgow Gang.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'll get you out of this mess. That's my duty to you. Always has been.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah, same as ever, you are, Vina. Not one bit different.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Hah. Just like it used to be, eh.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Just, there's one thing. I don't know if...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Baird, we're skint on supplies as is. Now you bring in all these people.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: You want everyone to split up once we're done eating? Or are you hoping I'll go rob some blockhouse with security up to here?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Shut it with that, Cador.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Although our stockpile's definitely...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Please, it's okay. We've brought rations with us. We even have some surplus.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm. Not... the biggest amount, but enough to put us out of dire straits for now.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: We can change this zone together.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As long as we can unite everyone on the plate...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Pff. Unite?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Listen, Cautus runt, 'unite' is an easy word to toss around. But you lot are more than welcome to try.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Fingers crossed... you're what makes the difference.
attributes.name: Cador
